scripts.migrate:baseline:if-empty: dotenv -e .env.local -- powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$exists = & 'C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe' -N -B -u $env:DB_USER --password=$env:DB_PASSWORD --host=$env:DB_HOST --port=$env:DB_PORT --database=$env:DB_NAME -e \"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema='$env:DB_NAME' AND table_name='users'\"; if ([int]$exists -eq 0) { Get-Content './scripts/baseline.sql' | & 'C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe' -u $env:DB_USER --password=$env:DB_PASSWORD --host=$env:DB_HOST --port=$env:DB_PORT --database=$env:DB_NAME } else { Write-Host 'Baseline skipped (users table already exists)'; }"
scripts.migrate:migrations: dotenv -e .env.local -- powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path './scripts/migrations' -Filter *.sql | Sort-Object Name | ForEach-Object { Write-Host 'Running migration:' $_.Name; Get-Content $_.FullName | & 'C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe' -u $env:DB_USER --password=$env:DB_PASSWORD --host=$env:DB_HOST --port=$env:DB_PORT --database=$env:DB_NAME }"
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:baseline:if-empty && npm run migrate:migrations
